name: Ken Lee's
body:
### Welcome to Ken's home page.
There are two purpose for this page
1.  Blogging about data science
2.  A front page to showcase some of the github repos I have contributed and created.



Here are some of the work I have done
* [Airport Competition App](realkenlee.shinyapps.io/airportcompetition), the [pitch](http://rpubs.com/realkenlee/pitchairportcompetitionapp).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
